page.description: Perform an incremental refresh of all List controls in the UX Component.

discussion.p: This function calls the [{dialog.object}.refreshListData()] method, passing in the optional *[js:{mode: "incremental"}]* parameter into the method.

An incremental refresh differs from a full refresh in that only rows that were edited on the server after the List was initially populated are sent to the client. An incremental refresh can only be done if the List's *[ui:Include CRC in List data]* property has been checked.

figure.title: Include CRC in List data property
